item.description:
You just started your own business or thought about “making an app for that?” You’re full of great ideas, but don’t know where to start? Come and join us for this great event, where young and experienced entrepreneurs will give you the best tips and tricks for a successful start to your business.

Speakers are Will Cox of Greenhorn Connect and Phil Tepfer of Kenai Sports. More speakers are confirmed shortly.

After attending, you will have insights on:
● Which steps experienced entrepreneurs have taken to successfully grow their business
● What issues you need to take into consideration when starting (intellectual property, funding)
● Which mistakes can easily be avoid

Register today @ efactor.com/beinspired and you might become the next Richard Branson or Mark Zuckerberg with these new insights! Tickets are $15 (at the door $20)

The Agenda
6:30pm - 7:00pm Pre-Event Networking Session
7:00pm - 7:30pm Keynote Speaker
7:30pm - 8:00pm Panel Discussion
8:00pm - 8:30pm Audience Q&A
8:30pm - 9:00pm Post-Event Networking Session
9:30pm - Event ends

*Make sure to check out EFactor.com, the world’s largest network for entrepreneurs to find useful resources, network with entrepreneurs in your industry, funding resources, and all event information.

group.name: Boston Web Design (and Dev) Meetup Group

item.name: Young Entrepreneurs: Don't Be Jealous, Be Inspired
